Specifications

Field Type Flags Description
acl Embedded Calendar's access control lists
description String Nullable Blankable The description of the calendar (max_length = 1024)
id Objectid Readonly Unique identifier of the resource
location String Nullable Blankable The location fo the calendar (max_length = 256)
resource_uri String Readonly URI which represent a specific resource. All references are based upon this scheme
summary String The summary (title) of the calendar (max_length = 64)
timezone String Blankable The timezone of the calendar (default = "UTC")
